definition: creeping shrub of eastern North America having white bell-shaped flowers followed by spicy red berrylike fruit and shiny aromatic leaves that yield wintergreen oil
details:
noun
- creeping shrub of eastern North America having white bell-shaped flowers followed by spicy red berrylike fruit and shiny aromatic leaves that yield wintergreen oil
= synonyms: wintergreen
- small prostrate or ascending shrub having scarlet flowers and succulent fruit resembling cranberries
= synonyms: groundberry
